column10: Layla is a seriously talented stylist who displays some great hairdressing skills.
column11: During her time in the salon she has picked up a vast array of advanced techniques along the way.
column12: She is a master of advanced bleach and toning techniques.

column10: Sarah recently joined the Base team after completing her art foundation course. She wanted to embark on a career that harnessed her creativity and hairdressing seemed like the right fit.
column11: She's now looking to build her skills in styling and blow drying hair plus basic colours & cuts.
column12: Book in for a consultation with her to see what she can do for you!

column10: Jamie is our latest recruit to sign up for an apprenticeship at Base. He's had a passion for the industry for years and decided to fully commit after enjoying a taster course he completed.
column11: He's eager to get up and running so is looking for clients for blow dry's and styling plus basic colour & cuts.
column12: Call up to check his availability
